description: This contract involves renovation of bridge culvert 3 at km 384.7 on the Alaska Highway in British Columbia. This includes removal of the existing culvert, its disposal, and the installation of new culvert liners through a trenchless method. The work will also involve implementation of a new highway, placement of concrete collars, roadside barriers, gabions. and hydroseeding along with installation of sediment and erosion control measures.
full_summary:
### Bridge Culvert No. 3 Rehabilitation Project
**Reference Number:** WS4688501160
**Solicitation Number:** WS4688501160
### Project Overview
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified contractors to submit bids for the rehabilitation of Bridge Culvert No. 3 located at Km 384.7 of the Alaska Highway in British Columbia.
### Tender Details
- **Publication Date:** 2024-07-16
- **Tender Closing Date:** 2024-07-31 14:00:00
- **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2024-08-30
- **Expected Contract End Date:** 2025-06-30

### Contract Obligations
The selected contractor will be responsible for rehabilitating the existing culvert, including the removal and disposal of existing materials, installation of new culvert liners using trenchless methods and lining. The scope of work also involves highway widening, installation of concrete collars, roadside barriers, and gabions. Other tasks include channel excavation, stream substrate placement, hydroseeding, and implementation of permanent sediment and erosion control measures.

### Contract Award Criteria
The tender will be awarded to the contractor who submits the lowest price based on the contract value.

### Contract Requirements
- **Language:** English
- **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- **Regions of Delivery:** British Columbia, Canada
- **Deliverables:** The completed rehabilitation of Bridge Culvert No. 3 to meet the required specifications and standards.

### Contact Information
To obtain more information on the tender, please contact:

- **Name:** Brandie Klyne (SPAC/PSPC)
- **Email:** [brandie.klyne@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:brandie.klyne@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
- **Notice URL:** https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20341035?extsite=MjAzNDEwMzVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Document Details
- **Reference Number:** WS4688501160
- **Amendment Number:** 0
